scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a frontal view of Christ, identified by his halo and beard, standing within an architectural niche. He is draped in a red mantle over a blue and grey striped tunic. In his left hand, he holds a golden orb surmounted by a cross, symbolizing his dominion over the world. His right hand is raised in a gesture of blessing. The background is a vibrant blue with radiating lines, suggesting divine light. The niche itself is framed by an elaborate, golden, Gothic-style arch with decorative tracery.
